sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AjaxPPMConfig</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Ajax utility to get teamwork area configurations using another server side script include "TeamworkAreaUtil"</description>
        <name>AjaxPPMConfig</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AjaxPPMConfig = Class.create();
AjaxPPMConfig.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getProjectTable:function(){
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		var table = SNC.PPMConfig.getProjectTable(this.getParameter('sysparm_table'));
		result.setAttribute('table', table);
		return 'true';
	},
	
	isNonTeamspace : function() {
		var response = this.newItem('result');
		var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_table_name');
		response.setAttribute('data', SNC.PPMConfig.isNonTeamSpace(tableName));
	},
	
    type: 'AjaxPPMConfig'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-03-26 17:08:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0e9748e993c33100ea933007f67ffbce</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AjaxPPMConfig</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0e9748e993c33100ea933007f67ffbce</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-27 12:20:17</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
